text: David F. Sandberg (born 21 January 1981) is a Swedish filmmaker. He also directed The Conjuring Universe spin-off horror movie Annabelle: Creation (2017), and Shazam! (2019), the seventh movie in the DC Extended Universe. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie directors Category:Swedish movie producers Category:Swedish screenwriters
title: David F. Sandberg
